description:
On International Women’s Day, the Brazilian Institute of Geography and Statistics released updated data on gender disparities within Brazil. The figures relate to 2022. They indicate progress across various sectors, albeit at a sluggish pace. However, a notable setback warrants attention: the rate of women among graduates entering careers has declined from 23.2 percent in […]

The post Gender disparity narrows in Brazil, but only slightly appeared first on The Brazilian Report.
title: Gender disparity narrows in Brazil, but only slightly
